import React from 'react' import Gallery01 from '../../assets/image/gallery/about-1.jpg' import Gallery02 from '../../assets/image/gallery/about-2.jpg' import gallery04 from '../../assets/image/gallery/about-4.png' import Shapes03 from '../../assets/image/shapes/about-3.jpg' function Intro() { return ( <>
Kevin Martin

experience

) } export default Intro
